original_text: Or ever the silver cord be loosed, or the golden bowl be broken, or the pitcher be broken at the fountain, or the wheel broken at the cistern.
korean_text: 은 줄이 풀리고 금 그릇이 깨지고 항아리가 샘 곁에서 깨지고 바퀴가 우물 위에서 깨지고

sentences.original_text: Or ever the silver cord be loosed
or the golden bowl be broken
or the pitcher be broken at the fountain
or the wheel broken at the cistern
